content: Hello! This is the AI receptionist for XYZ Home Services. I understand you might need HVAC service. May I have your name to get started with scheduling?
Thanks, Emily. Could you please provide your address so I can check if we're able to serve your location?
Sure, I live at 4925 Pine Ridge Ct, Fairview.
Thank you. Let me check if your address falls within our service area.
Emily, it appears that your address is outside our current service area. Unfortunately, we wonâ€™t be able to send a technician to your location. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
Oh, that's disappointing. I found a cheaper competitor online anyway, so I guess I'll go with them. Thanks for your time.
